page.title: 09Mixed Farming
page.content:
Farmers have larger farms now than they used to have. Most keep one type of animal - cows for dairy farming,pigs for pig farming or fowl for poultry{farmers.
Other farmers grow crops such as wheat barley or rye.One important crop grown here is potatoes which are used in large quantities in this area.
Recently a new is being grown. When it flowers the fields look like vast bright yellow carpets. This crop is called{rape }and is used for making {linen.
When a farmer has a variety of these things it is called {mixed {farming.
